description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Avatar Climbing" is a multiplayer action platformer that offers a multiplayer Score Attack Mode, single player Time Attack Mode, P2P Time Attack rankings, Course design support, and P2P sharing of courses.
description.short: "Avatar Climbing" is a multiplayer action platformer that offers a multiplayer Score Attack Mode, single player Time Attack Mode, P2P Time Attack rankings, Course design support, and P2P sharing of courses.
